thread.title: 'We are all Africans' - cabinet minister speaks out against xenophobia
thread.title_full: 'We are all Africans' - cabinet minister speaks out against xenophobia

title: 'We are all Africans' - cabinet minister speaks out against xenophobia
text:
"Our African neighbours are our brothers & sisters. We are all Nigerians‚ we are all Zimbabweans‚ we're all South Africans. #WeareAllAfricans," he tweeted. 
He added: We strongly condemn any attempts to mobilise communities against our fellow African brothers and sisters. This is totally unacceptable. — Min. Nathi Mthethwa (@NathiMthethwaSA) February 24, 2017 Share Tweet SHARE YOUR OPINION If you have an opinion you would like to share on this article, please to the Times LIVE iLIVE team. In the mean time, click here to view the Times LIVE iLIVE section.
